state.response: ماحولیاتی عوامل کی مختلف قسمیں ایپی جینیٹک تبدیلیوں کا سبب بن سکتی ہیں۔
claims: Environmental factors can cause epigenetic changes.

state.response: ماحولیاتی عوامل کی مختلف قسمیں ایپی جینیٹک تبدیلیوں کا سبب بن سکتی ہیں۔
claims: Environmental factors can cause epigenetic changes.

Environmental factors can cause epigenet: Can environmental factors cause epigenetic changes? Environmental factors and epigenetic changes

Epigenetics turns genes "on" and "off." Your epigenetics change as you age, both as part of normal development and aging and because of exposure to environmental factors that happen over the course of your life. Epigenetic changes can affect your health in different ways.
Can environmental factors cause epigenetic changes? Environmental factors and epigenetic changes

Epigenetic marks can be affected by exposure to metals, air pollution, benzene, organic pollutants, and electromagnetic radiation [98]. Chemical and xenobiotic compounds in water or the atmosphere are other potential environmental stressors capable of changing epigenetic status.
